amendment.description: Amendment prohibits DoD funding to house any foreign nationals who are in the custody of and detained by U.S. Immigration and Customs Enforcement.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 437 printed in Part B of House Report 116-143 to prohibit DoD funding to house any foreign nationals who are in the custody of and detained by U.S. Immigration and Customs Enforcement.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Thompson (MS) amendment (A054) Agreed to by recorded vote: 213 - 204 (Roll no. 469).

action.text: Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
Roll call votes on amendments in House
House amendment offered/reported by: Amendment (A054) offered by Mr. Thompson (MS).
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Thompson (MS) amendment (A054) Agreed to by recorded vote: 213 - 204 (Roll no. 469).
